p: Although data are not entirely consistent, a recent meta-analysis showed that a history of head trauma was associated with âˆ¼60% higher risk of PD [ 74]. Two studies further showed that head injury in early life was especially associated with a higher risk of PD [ 75, 76]. The recent data on poor olfaction and RBD [ 27, 64, 67] further add to the evidence that head injury plays a role in early stages of PD development.
